EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_dotNET CloudNative Bootcamp_Denver_Q317.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for .NET Cloud-Native Bootcamp
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registered for the upcoming .NET Cloud-Native Bootcamp, hosted by Pivotal. This will be a full, fun day to learn about patterns and technology. We’ll take care of breakfast and lunch, so don’t worry about packing anything! Before arriving on July 19th, make sure that you’ve installed the Cloud Foundry CLI <[[https://docs.cloudfoundry.org/cf-cli/install-go-cli.html#installer]]> (versions exist for Windows, Mac, and Linux) on your laptop. Also, be sure to have a development environment handy, as we’ll be slinging some code together. Pivotal will take care of providing the initial source code, and hosting environment. If you’d like to read up on Cloud Foundry <[[http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-10/concepts/index.html]]> and Steeltoe <[[https://steeltoe.io/]]>, feel free. But don’t worry, we’ll do an engaging deep dive together.
Date: Wednesday, July 19, 2017
Time:
8:30AM to 4:45PM
Location:
Enterprise Coworking | University Classroom 3000 Lawrence St. Denver, CO 80205 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/3000+Lawrence+St,+Denver,+CO+80205/@39.76149,-104.9811731,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x876c7918da6038b7:0x14cf198fde03447e!8m2!3d39.76149!4d-104.9789844]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please contact the organizer at rseroter@pivotal.io <[[mailto:rseroter@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/dotNET-Cloud-Native-Bootcamp-Denver.html]]>
